title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-2.5 - Lowest achievable emission rate, laer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-2.5 - Lowest achievable emission rate, laer

State Regulations
(a) LAER applicability. For a proposed source
project or a proposed major facility which is subject to this Subpart for any
nonattainment contaminant, LAER shall be required for any emission source which
is part of the proposed source project or the proposed major facility and which
emits that nonattainment contaminant. (b) LAER analysis requirement. A LAER
analysis shall be submitted as part of a permit application for a proposed
source project or proposed major facility subject to this Subpart. (c) Timing for LAER. LAER shall not be
established in final form until the permit for the proposed source project or
proposed major facility is issued. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
231-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
